meanings.sent1: The sightliest flowers bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The painting of the sunset was the sightliest in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The sightliest dress made everyone admire her at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the sightliest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The sightliest rainbow arched across the sky after the rain.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is most pleasing to the sight.
meanings.sent1: She danced sightliest under the spotlight.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks lit up the night sky sightliest.
meanings.sent3: He dressed sightliest for the costume party, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone sightliest on the clearest night.
meanings.sent5: The city lights sparkled sightliest from the hilltop view.
